com.fortify.pub.serialization

Class DeserializableClass<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.pub.serialization.DeserializableClass<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicDeserializableClass

    public class DeserializableClass<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Specification for safely de-serializable class.

    This object is immutable and thread-safe.

    See Also:
    ValidatingObjectReader

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructs specification of top-level class to be de-serialized.

      Constructs specification of top-level class to be de-serialized.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeserializableClass

        public DeserializableClass(java.lang.Class<T> aClass,
                           ClassNameMatcher whitelistMatcher)
        Constructs specification of top-level class to be de-serialized.
        Parameters:
        aClass - top-level class to be de-serialized, must not be null
        whitelistMatcher - a class name matcher used to whitelist class names, must not be null

      • DeserializableClass

        public DeserializableClass(java.lang.Class<T> aClass,
                           java.util.List<ClassNameMatcher> whitelist,
                           java.util.List<ClassNameMatcher> blacklist)
        Constructs specification of top-level class to be de-serialized.
        Parameters:
        aClass - top-level class to be de-serialized, must not be null
        whitelist - a list of class name matchers used to whitelist class names, must not be null or empty
        blacklist - a list of class name matchers used to blacklist class names, if null, no class names are blacklisted

    • Method Detail

        Casts obj to T.
        Parameters:
        obj - an instance of T
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - when obj is not an instance of T.
